channel.description:

Found these gems on osrs reddit, feel free to discuss.

item.title: OSRS Formulas
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

Yeah we have the formulas now, and they just flat out give us monster stat values too. I was like holy shit. I put a lot of time into copying some of it over to my source, and even got some more values from my osrs account, but I lost membership and got a job so I stopped working on my source (still work on the 530 client refactor though). But it’s definitely really cool that with OSRS we have the potential to make some really accurate shit.

Read full topic

item.title: OSRS Formulas
item.dc:creator: @Rodgerwilco Rodgerwilco
item.description:
@Rodgerwilco wrote:

Oh I wish I would of seen it.

I have been working on the RSC combat system myself and I love how open the osrs team is with the source. (Example: Them saying that the lost city content hasn’t been touched since 2002)

Good stuff.

Read full topic

item.title: OSRS Formulas
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

I linked this a few months ago, specifically the DPS calculator. Very good read, and with the information you can get with npc examine you can have near perfect combat on rsps now. I actually have the changes on the official server source, not sure if I pushed it yet or not…

Read full topic
